QuestData.Title: Drop It then Rock It!
QuestData.Description: I'm not about to put the fate of this mission into the hands of some untested scrub.$B$BNow, if you want to prove to me that you've got what it takes to carry out this mission, you'll need to do what I tell you.$B$BTake this battle standard and head over to Baleheim, directly north of here. Once you're at Baleheim, find the center of town and drop our flag. Fight off any vrykul dirt bags that attempt to take down our beloved flag and return to me once you've established Alliance dominance!
QuestData.LogDescription: Lieutenant Icehammer in the Howling Fjord wants you to place the Alliance Banner in Baleheim and then defend the banner against attackers.$B$BReturn to Lieutenant Icehammer with the Alliance Banner should you survive.
QuestData.CompletionText: Still alive, I see. Clearly you're not trying hard enough.
QuestData.RewardText: For the Alliance! You're a strong one, $n. Strong enough to crack some vrykul skull at Nifflevar.
